reviews.text:
I just got a late lunch from Teriyaki One and it was delicious.

Very nice presentation, large portions, well-prepared food, and very affordable.

Will definitely add this place to my go-to rotation moving forward.

Highly Recommend.

That is my go to place.Where I can get a quick an hot meal.I was happy last night.I went there late last night almost 9 PM close to closing  time.Someone was mopping they  were still cooking.Yet someone must of turned off the burners to keep the dumpling and spring roll warm and fried rice.The only thing that was hot was the chicken an shrimp .We had 3 orders  of Bento Box.My wife threw the food mostly away in anger.I kept one in the refrigerater.Who wants to keep all that food wasting space in the fridge I dont I felt one  was enough.I went there this afternoon an asked them for a full refund the manager refused he wanted the other trays of food back again I explained  we tossed it in the garbage after a few minutes I was getting pretty heated,He offered a refund for one I didnt think that was fair.I wanted a full  refund.or at least half way.I accepted the refund for one at the end which I think was unfair half would of have been better.I do not think I will go there again.Honestly I feel bad that it turned out like that because I did like the place
Its calm and a friendly atmosphere. Recieved my food fast and it tasted nice.
The food came fast and was good. The customer service was also nice.
Amazingly good. Droolingly delicious. The poke bowls are to d*e for ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
So delicious and great!
Good all day
I love this place great food and they give you a good amount of food for a great price
Very good and tasty food i love it and I enjoy it
Clean and fast service! Very reliable
Amazing dumplings
Great shrimp tempura, clean restaurant, and even nicer service
Fast service and very friendly food is really good
The food isn‚Äôt fresh. The service is on point. The restaurant is clean and environment. Feel safe. I love this place.

They don‚Äôt seal your food when you order from Uber! This is the second time I‚Äôve ordered and my food wasn‚Äôt sealed. I don‚Äôt even feel comfortable eating it because my food could have been tampered withü§¢
Muy buena comida
Great food, Great service!
So happy they   opened  they and service amazing
So clean and fresh! Love it
Good place to get take out

Love this place so happy they opened up in my neighborhood! Food is great and so is the atmosphere!  I always order the teriyaki with  lo main noodles extra sauce and I love it! Also love how after ordering 5 teriyaki you get one for free!!
Comfortable seating at your convenience, clean establishment and kind service
Love the food here!
Food is always great  here
Todo estaba delicioso
This is my first time coming here and I enjoyed the food, you get a wide variety of food options
Their sushi is so good at a great price and the service is fast

Ahh the place looks nice, friendly staff. The food on the other hand, I dont know definitely not your traditional teriyaki there‚Äôs just something about it. It‚Äôs not flavorful don‚Äôt have that great teriyaki taste it‚Äôs just not good to me. The noodles were overcooked and they don‚Äôt pack you with a lot of chicken or beef like a true teriyaki place the vegetables were not existent for someone who actually enjoys the vegetables. I wouldn‚Äôt wanna have to pay extra for a decent amount of vegetables that supposed to be with my meal. Overall, There‚Äôs a pizza shop across the street.
The food was delicious place very clean would love to eat here again

I ordered thru doordash and i just got disappointed. The teriyaki chicken is bland, the fried rice is bland and dry. The shrimp tempura is okay, not the best but its fine. I feel like i wasted my money. The serving of the chicken teriyaki is huge even though i only ordered small.
Good placeÔºÅ

I ordered a signature roll and asked them to remove an ingredient  that I was allergic to. The cashier taking my order seemed confused. She turned and spoke to the other workers in another language and then they all laughed, including the cashier. I thought that was odd, but I didn't think much of it. After all, I couldn't understand what they were saying. I paid the $11.34 plus tax for the signature roll, and as I waited for my order, I looked at the menu and realized that, since they removed that ingredient, they pretty much charged me $11.34 for a basic roll that is listed at $6.99 on a different part of the menu. That's why they were laughing. When I confronted them about it, they tried to gaslight me because they got caught overcharging me for my food. I thought that was very ugly and dishonest of them. I used to come here regularly, but I certainly won't be back.
Immaculate

They serve a really healthy amount of food in return for the price. The food is cooked in front of you right away and the Pace of Work is amazing. They will also make sure they meet your special request. No matter how busy it goes. They will make sure that there is cleaned and even ask for your feedback. I really like their rewards system as well. They don‚Äôt bother with texting and messages.
Great food. Great service. A bit more expensive but everything is since covid. Worth it though.
This place serves great food. The place is always clean, u always have a place to sit, and service is friendly. If u like Japanese then stop here for a quick bite
Beef teriyaki has too much noodles to little beef
Muy buena la comida buen servicio excelente
Great food at a great price ..
Great fast service.  Always clean
Loved being here, great deal with the chicken teriyaki!! Very clean also. Nice customer service! N definitely beat my hunger
Good food
Professional but quiet. Most Asians do not engage conversations with customers but the cashier is nice.
Fast, tasty, and well priced. I strongly recommend!
Muy buena tienda la recomiendo
Food is always fresh and service is great! I love how quick and filling the food is.
Excellent service and food
bought teriyaki beef and I feel so bad. I was in the bathroom all night until the afternoon. I don't recommend it
Great place
Fire

Tried their sushi and teriyaki chicken, shrimp and beef. The food tasted good. Freshly made and the portions are big. The service was excellent and the food is ready quickly. The restaurant is clean and spacious.

All I know is we need to help them get even MORE reviews üòÇ

Tried them for the first time yesterday with my husband and we did not expect their food to be as good as it was.

First of all, delivery was incredibly fast! We placed the order and received it in less than half an hour I believe üòÖ

Presentation of the delivered plates: 10/10

We ordered two bento boxes through an app (door dash I believe) without appetizers because each plate already had great variety - and it only made USD$39!

Each bento box had rice (steamed or fried), choice of meat, green salad, 3 fried dumplings and 2 spring rolls.

I ordered the shrimp bento box and my husband the chicken & beef one - and they were both SO FINE üòÇ

The portions were incredible - so MUCH FOOD

Really really good, fresh ingredients - perfectly sliced meats, very well seasoned, all ingredients and components very well cooked, perfectly fried dumplings and spring rolls - the spring rolls were by the way one of the best ones I have ever tried - very tasty rice...

The most surprising part... everything tasted SO FRESH & HEALTHY... we just loved it!

Do see ourselves ordering again from them to continue trying some of their other dishes.

A great recommendation and option in this area üëçüèª

Ok, so - updated my review because.. you know how sometimes you try one place and you ABSOLUTELY LOVE them and then you immediately effusively recommend them to some other people... and you invite them your favorite dish there so that you can enjoy it with them - but it turns out to be PRETTY BAD this time?

Ok üòÇ this second time we ordered Teriyaki was SO BAD I wouldnt have ever ordered a second time, had this second time been my first üòÖ

Maybe its too soon since they are fairly new... might give them a try in a couple of months... third is the charm ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Very quick service! I eat here once a week and their $9.99 combo is the best deal as someone who works very close to the hospital.
i loved my experience the service is beautiful and very good sushi i loved it 10/10 would do again!
The food was good and I loved the way it tasted the customer service was good
I love this place the food is amazing
Just what this area needed honestly üòÇ. The food taste üî• no complaints

I've a frequent customer and I have some thoughts. Overall, I enjoy their food. I like their sushi (specialty rolls and regular rolls), the avocado salad, and their teriyaki dishes. They usually give big portions which is nice ( there was an occasion or two where it was skimpy) and they have options - for protein as well as the side.
Two issues that I've had with them -
1 - Their proteins as far as I know have always been boneless - and on one occasion my husband and I had chicken bones in our food which was disconcerting as they were small pieces and if we really bit hard could have done some damage

2 - I usually ask for either all veggie, or majority veggie with a small amount of rice or noodle. I'm going to give up on asking for the latter, for they never do it. I don't know what the problem is with me asking for more veg, but they never do it. They always end up giving me an overwhelming amount or rice/noodles with a small amount of veg. I believe I'm even charged for it. Since I always do take out, its already packed and I never check it. I don't feel like I should have to since I'm always clear with my instructions.
I'm just going to stop asking for it.
Again, this is a great place to eat and you get a bang for your buck, but if you expect a special order forget it.
A amazing experience I felt very welcomed and enjoyed the delicious food!
The shrimp Poke bowls have me coming back for more every time
The service was very good and the food was fast and delicious.

This place is one of few that I can say not only has a great vibe to it but the food is really good and freshly made, and their sushi is absolutely flavorful not dry at all like I‚Äôve experienced in other places. 10/10 definitely recommend stopping here if you‚Äôre in the area and looking for something good to eat
This place is really clean and well-kept.

I was excited when saw the sign however after have a little time today, decided to give it a try, then my expectations when south; for starters 1)visual is the first sense (clean place is ok), smell of food is second(not even there), when you are going to eat...then 2)container full of rice, vegetables barely saw then, 3)food is not savory, is eatable but not great,  4)some people might like or love teriyaki sauce on the food, but some others don't, "Please ask before do that".... do not assume. -Definitely next time when I'm craving again for Japanese food, will prefer to go a few extra miles in Cross County.

So happy this restaurant is so close to home. We had the chicken and beef teriyaki and a poke bowl!! Let me tell you that food was delicious!! The poke bowl was a beauty!! Definitely coming back to try the sushi next!!
I ordered from Uber eats yeseterday. Took two bites and realized the fried rice smelled and tasted spoiled. Had to throwout.
The members of this specific establishment are great at listening to your food concerns and questions. I hey are very clean and a great addition to the community.
The costumer service was so well, when you order the food you get your order done immediately . The best part is the food is amazing, love it so much.
Great service. Food always ready for pick-up and delicious, large portions. Love the Chicken Teriyaki. I order teriyaki chicken every day. Let's go try it Go Go Go Go GoÔΩûÔΩûÔΩûÔΩûÔΩû^_^^_^
I‚Äôve been coming here for months since they opened & haven‚Äôt had any issue & love the food & portions! I collect the stamp cards too much at this point !!

I went earlier today and had the chicken bento üç±. It was good but I wish I had more teriyaki sauce on my chicken as it was bit bland. Also wish the chicken was seasoned with some other flavors besides just teriyaki sauce. The teriyaki sauce doesn't really do much for flavor. Fried rice is just like brown rice with peas and carrots nothing special but not mad at it. The lettuce needed more yum yum sauce it barely had any on it. The spring rolls and dumplings that come with the bento were delicious. I'll come back to try sushi next time. And also try bento again with noodles next. Also want to try there poke bowls as well. But this place is very clea, spacious, and the employees are respectful and friendly. Good service! We needed something different in the neighborhood thank you for bringing this to offer the area.
